title: The Neverending Story (Captioned)
creator_credit: Bernard Eichinger, Dieter Geissler and Wolfgang Petersen
brief_description: A young boy escapes the neighbourhood bullies by retreating into a mysterious book that takes him into a shimmering fantasy world of creatures, giant forests and massive oceans. It is an awesome world, but a world in decay, and its existence is being threatened. Rated: G.
